H0.text: In feet, how wide is a singles tennis court. 20 feet

H1.text: In feet, how wide is a singles tennis court. 25 feet

H2.text: In feet, how wide is a singles tennis court. 30 feet

H3.text: In feet, how wide is a singles tennis court. 27 feet

A4.text: Its width is 27 ft (8.23 m) for singles matches and 36 ft (10.97 m) for doubles matches.
